rate pradha­nama pura­wa­si­yage lipi shirsha yoda­gena ahin­saka jana­yage mudal kollaka meki jawa­rame sula­mula ana­wa­ra­naya kara­ga­ni­medi basna­hira palatha bara jyeshta niyojya poli­spathi desha­bandu thenna­kon maha­thage ruju adhi­ksha­naya yatathe kolambaa dakuna kottasa bara jyeshta polis adhi­kari sisira peththa­tha­nthrige saha kolambaa dakuna kottasa anka 02 saha­kara polis adhi­kari parsi mayi­kal yana maha­thwa­runge upa­des matha kiru­la­pana polis sthana­dhi­pathi pradhana polis pari­kshaka chandana kalu­aa­rachchi maha­thage pradha­na­thwa­yen ehi apa­radha wima­rshana anshaye sthana­dhi­pathi polis pari­kshaka pradip edi­ri­wira athulu upa­po­lis pari­kshaka chamika jaya­wira, sara­ya­nwa­run wana (9233) jaya­wira, (37060) sanath, (61413) suranga, (66151) karu­na­na­yaka), kostha­pa­lwa­run wana (70225) kapila, (71943) bandara, (78686) aruna, (30574) chandika, (37783) wije­thunga, (68485) samira, (82458) banda­ra­na­yaka saha kantha kostha­pal (10133) dilshani wima­rsha­na­wa­lata ekwuha.

ramanynya maha nikaye hata nawawana (69) warshika upasampada mahothsawaya ada (02)sita 10 wanida dakwa athi uthkarshawath ayurin mathara di pawathwe.nilwala gange idikara athi alankara udakupbepa sima malakayedi pawathwena mewara uthsawayedi samanerayanwahansela harasiya namak (400)upasampada shilayehi pihituwimata nimithaya.mehi samarambhaka uthsawaya janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage pradhanathwayen ha agramathya di.mu.jayarathna, kathanayaka chamal rajapaksha, wipaksha nayaka ranil wikramasinha mahathwarunge ha disthrikkaye siyalu mathi amathiwarunge sahabhagithwayen ada(02)sawasa dekata pawathwena athara ehi mulasuna ramanynya maha nikaye mahanayaka aggamaha panditha napana pemasiri na himiyo usulathi.
